content.detailedDescription:
An avid sky-watcher and amateur astronomer, i've seen meteors, fireballs, comets, and satellites as well as things that are frequently reported as ufos such as aircraft, birds, bugs, and advertising lights.  i spend a lot of time sky-watching, and hadn't seen anything unusual in over a year until last night.  

at 8:23pm, i noticed a bright glowing orange light a few degrees east of due north and about 20 degrees above the horizon. at first i thought it was a plane because it seemed to be near long beach intl airport, but the color wasn't typical of aircraft lights. through my binoculars, it looked slightly vertically elongated as opposed to round. i noticed no other lights on it. i also couldn't bring it into focus and the upper portion was fuzzier than the bottom portion.  it slowly moved upwards and then slightly eastward, and then it moved slightly erratically and quickly faded out without a trace. having read numerous reports about the propensity of orange orbs to travel in groups, i watched for more, but no more appeared.

then at about 8:45pm, i was looking towards the sse at a light that was probably a high altitude jet, and in the same general area a bright blue light appeared about 20 degrees above the horizon. it was about as bright as venus when it's at its brightest. then less than two seconds later it disappeared without a trace.
content.summary: Orange orb, then a bright blue light that disappeared in <2 seconds

content.detailedDescription: I was out fishing with my mom and her friend but then i saw a bright orb in the sky and i was thinking that it was a star but then it started moving and i told my mom was quick to say that it was a plane but then it started hovering and then it just disappered behind the clouds. i didn't feel anything out of the ordinary. i also tried to film it with my iphone 5s but the camera was just black i even pointed it to the fire but it was still black and audio was not working either.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Bright light

content.detailedDescription: Went to buy beer at 11, because the store closes. on the way home... saw it... and... then its hours later... and i mean on the clock... it was... noticable to everyone. i saw it. it was like nothing else existed... but i sped away. and i still.... i guess theres no beating it
content.summary: Saw it... lost a whole hour... seeing it was unmistakable... ive seen it in a few shots... then... its there.. and i get home and its over an hour possible. i left to the store because it was going to close, i got home.. and an hour had passed...

content.detailedDescription:
This is my second fireball/red-orange orb encounter in the same field as before years prior. the first time i saw it, it seemed as if a fighter jet ripped through the sky maybe 100ft above the ground and road flares were being dropped from the aircraft into the field.  i was still a minor, completely sober, but also home alone. i grabbed my keys and hit the road the second it happened. called it in but i'm sure they thought it was a prank or i was just under the influence.
the second fireball/orb was a couple days ago. i was looking at the full moon with my telescope when i noticed one crater lot up like nyc. i live in the sticks, coyotes are one thing but the owls are rare to hear. anyways after looking at this crater, the coyotes were drawing nearer and the owls start (i can't explain the noise, it was too eerie). then i hear a splash? a pile of liquid just appears next to me on the cement then evaporated almost instantly. that's when i looked to the east and saw the fire-orb as i wish to call it. hovering above the tress it lingered to the left then to the right. bobbed as i was calling my mother over to see it and even though she was in perfect view to see the last 2 seconds of it, she couldn't. it had vanished, before the both of us, but only i could see it. shortly after, my phone couldn't decide if it wanted to work or not. the yard light (basically a telephone pole light) went out. then the crickets were chirping as quick as cricketly possible!! i had a hard time sleeping to say the least. this was my 5th or 6th ufo i have seen since 2010.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Was looking out at the sky and felt like i had to turn around to face east. sure enough a red/orange orb/fireball hovered the treeline 3/4 a mile away. called my mother over but she couldn't see it. it was clear as day.

content.detailedDescription: Bright light in the sky just chilling there and then it started to move up and stopped again and started getting brighter until it stopped and zoom out sight
content.summary: It was moving up then stopped got brighter for 10 mins and then zoom out of sight

content.detailedDescription:
First of all let me say i'm a huge fan, i like the way you communicate with people on your website. i would be very interested in getting interviewed to give the detail of my personal experience with this phenomenon. 
as far as the sighting and experience i went through it happened on june 10 of 2014 north of dallas texas near mckinney texas on a toll road at 3am. on this particular evening me and an ex-girlfriend had just gotten in an argument and broke up and i left her house and started driving home back to dallas from mckinney texas on the toll road. at this time there were no cars on the freeway it was completely empty probably because it was so late. the area that i was in and its also very country there's not a lot of construction it's mainly open fields in the location where i was that driving back. so i was headed back to dallas on the freeway then all of a sudden i could sense or feel something following my car, and i look behind the car and i saw what you will see in the image which was like an object of light that could shape shift between a circle to a triangle to an oval shaped object. so i knew that was definitely not a drone. and the object kept following my car when i looked to the right side of the car it was following me it must've been probably at least three or 4 miles at this point since it started following my car. again i was the only car on the road at the time. not exactly sure how far the object was for my car but i can tell you it definitely changed shapes and sizes, and it was  maybe 500 feet from the car or so. when i picked up my camera i initially wanted to take video, but i was driving at a high speed probably like 85 miles an hour and it was a little too dangerous so i went ahead and just took three photos but it's really weird because it's almost like the object sensed that i was taking pictures because right after i took the last photo it moved so fast that the naked eye could barely catch how fast it moved then it disappeared. so obviously it did not want to be photographed. here is what i saw. i will send three attachments to make sure you got each picture. 
 i wanted to add to the description of what i saw. if you pay attention to the photos you will see that the yellow light is the streetlights and the white circular/oval shaped light that shape shifted is the ufo. also notice that the ufo does not leave a shadow, i thought that was very weird. the light was a white light and it could've been a craft that change shapes as well as change dimension or size of the craft. in my opinion the craft probably hides under the lighting it projects so you can't really see it's true material or form. that's all i wanted to add thank you very much.
content.summary: On june 10,2014 at 3:13 am i was leaving my x gfs house and about 10 mins into the drive home i felt and noticed something following me. i looked and it was a ufo that shape shifted and was bright well it projected white light and was circular.

content.detailedDescription: Lost object observed lowe's a plane a beam of light from the top shot out like a spotlight previous to that a store posted video clips to include that mostly absolute family extreme buzzing pulsating heart rapid vibrations in ear canal followed by absolute no memory blackouts vibrations flying objects in home poltergeist experience i f***** up tonight
content.summary: I don't know

content.detailedDescription: I observed large object over long island sound near charles island in milford, ct. i went out to make sure our cars were locked because there have been a number of car break ins lately. i thought it was a blimp at first but it seemed to be too large. i then went to the beach end at the end of my street too see what it was. i then noticed flashing lights of different colors in sequence near what seemed to be the middle of the object. the object seemed to be stationary. i then noticed what seemed to be helicopters coming from the stratford/devon area towards the object. then over head came three low flying helicopters at rapid speed. at first i thought there must be some explanation or that it was in fact a blimp (however large) until the helicopters showed up. i then observed for about a half hour. as soon as the helicopters came near the object it disappeared. i didn't see any trails or anything. just one minute it was there and then it wasn't. i did not call authorities because i didn't want to seem paranoid or crazy. i watched the helicopters comb the area for about a half hour. three broke off and came closer to my location and i thought i could see something like a parachute or something hanging below one of them. they then reversed direction and headed towards stratford/devon ct. one by one they seemed to land, except one. this one seemed to patrol the area. i then went home to tell my wife. i am still not quite sure what i witnessed but it was definitely strange. sikorsky aircraft is in stratford and they sometimes test helicopters but never this late at night. we don't have any bases in this immediate area that i am aware of. the object seemed to be beyond charles island, which is small but not tiny and the object seemed to be much larger as it was farther away. when i first saw the object i wanted to go down to the beach end and see what the heck it was but then i got a whole lot more. my wife thinks i'm nuts and i don't have any video or witnesses. i kept looking around hoping someone would show up so i could have backup but no one did. i don't know as of yet if anyone else observed the object. as i am reporting this right away so it is still fresh. i wish to remain anonymous as to avoid and ridicule but i though you should know so at least you could look into it. thank you.
content.summary: Saw object over long island sound. thought blimp. many lights flashing. then many helos. then disappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
We were up on table mtn, wrightwood, ca to observe the perseids meteor shower.  i had my camera on a tripod and was taking 30 second exposures of the sky to try and get photos of the meteors.  my partner was sitting in the convertible while i was adjusting the camera settings.  i noticed a bright light over the trees to my left and noticed a black triangular shaped craft hovering.  i yelled at my partner to have a look and he spotted it too.  it then took off in a north west direction.  it actually flew thru my camera's view and i captured the light trai which was huge compared to the light trail the jet following it left.

we were both excited to see the craft, especially the fact that it was hovering and then took off rapidly.  it flew past the tree line and headed towards palmdale.

i've attached two photos.  one of the triangular craft's light trail and the other of the jet following it....As you can see, the craft's light trail is huge and super bright compared to that of the jet.  it was an awesome experience.
content.summary: Triangular shaped craft with bright lights in center hovering and then flying off.

content.detailedDescription: Black hovering around cloud went behind low cloud then took off at high speed toward south southwest toward fenton mo.  strange irregular black shape almost like what a large dark cave entrance would look like from a distance. or threw google earth. or maybe a dark light beam hitting a surface if that makes any since ?  for lack of better definition or words. i may return with more info  possible image  unsure if i should  even be here texting this info now.
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Black hovering around cloud went behind low cloud then took off at high speed toward south

content.detailedDescription: Driving south at around 9:25 pm i saw a bright round light in the south, i said what the heck is that,alot bigger than a plane light, as i live close to chicago and we have an airport close, it was descending in a easterly direction and went out of my site, i have no idea how far it was but when i realized its moving and very big, i knew i was seeing something unusual, it was out of sight within a minute. it was much bigger than a star, but not as big as the moon, but the moon is way higher than this bright round light, it could of been in kentucky,indiana or southern illinois, did anyone see what i saw ?
content.summary: Driving south i observed a bright white round ball in the sky, moving slowly it was smaller than moon but just as bright disapeared on horiz

content.detailedDescription: Outside to take picture of incoming rain cloud to send to wife.Saw object after pic expansion.Possible buzzard, love to ride thermals this time of year.Just not sure.
content.summary: Took photo without notice of object till expanded.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting outside with my neighbor when she noticed a ball of fire in the sky. at first we thought that it was a meteor, but then it went up instead of down. there also was no visible trail behind it. it went over her house and then blinked out. we saw the same phenomenon tonight.
content.summary: There was a burning orange-red ball in the sky.

content.detailedDescription: My girlfriend and i were swimming in our back yard. she asked me what was that?  pointed to a orange orb in the same flight path as pbi approach. (east to west)  then it appeared to get brighter maybe by 25 - 50%  spead up and headed towards space it ascended towards space easily 20× faster than our commercial airlines.  as it got up to upper atmosphere light became white and it moved into space faster than our satellites cross the sky. it disappeared in the upper western sky.
content.summary: Orange orb ascended into space at an unbelievable speed

content.detailedDescription: It was a night when meteors might be sighted, so i took my phone outside my back door.  the moon was just to the south west.  it seemed clear out, the moon was very bright.  i noticed 3 lights spaced far apart in the sky.  i took 5 or 6 photos, because i have seen things in my photos that were not visible to the eye when i took them (previous times).  the objects or lights didn't move when i was outside.  the reflection from the moon changed in each picture.  in one photo there is a very bright orb close to the ground, below the moon.  it wasn't visible when i took the photo.  this is one of several times i have witnessed something very unusual.  it is very puzzling to me.  i am open to these kind of experiences.  i took the pictures and returned indoors.  i only looked at the photos the next morning; that is when i enlarged the small lights and found them to be chevron shaped "craft" in the sky (3).  the orb appears only in 1 photo; a complete mystery to me.  interesting to see the order the pictures were taken.
content.summary: There was supposed to be meteors that night; i took some pics when i noticed 3 lights in the sky general area of moon.

content.detailedDescription: Just pulled over to take a picture of an odd road in the country and when my buddy snapped the picture we both felt really weird and drove off really fast the picture shows its face and eye
content.summary: Just pulled over to take a picture of an odd road in the country and when my buddy snapped the picture we both felt really weird and drove off really fast the picture shows its face and eye

content.detailedDescription: Looking out at the sky tonight, not expecting to see anything--again, seeing the object in the general area as it was this morning (see prior report).  there were 2 more objects to the left and right sides of the sighting.  the formation of the sighting is like a "v" shape.  these objects were very active moving sideways up and down the same colors, white and blue, red and green patterns just in a flashing pattern.  at one point, the object on the right appeared to tilt on it's side a little bit.  with this new appearance, it appeared to be a very large (huge)saucer-like shape.  i don't like using that as an analogy, but i don't know what other way i can describe it.  it looks like it has a wide rim around it where the colors were flashing through it or around it.  the fog started overtaking my view of the object.  the night was clear with lots of stars out.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Witness observed what appeared to be the same object she reported in 4 prior reports.  however, there were 3 of them this time and appeared to be doing acrobatic flying maneuvers to entertain whomever was watching.

content.detailedDescription: Looking out the back door, automatically looking up in the sky, noticing again, very bright lights, it appeared to be the same object that i've seen on the other sightings.  the sky was still dark but it was getting more daylight in the hue.  still clear, but as time elapsed, the fog started interfering with the visibility of my sight of the object.  the object appeared to be the same shape, color, etc., as the previous sightings.
content.summary: This is the 4th sighting by witness in same general residential area, which is about 6 miles from a small airport and 30 miles west of a u.S. naval facility on the coast.

content.detailedDescription:
Looking out our kitchen window, saw the bright pulsating light in the sky.  the sky was clear with no other objects or even stars.  
this object is in the general area as the previous sightings i've mentioned in the 2 prior reports.  i've again taken some pictures of it.  [note from f.I.:  the witness was very shaken up during the fist 2 sightings but was much more composed during the this sighting and the 2 that follow.]
content.summary: This was the 3rd sighting by this witness.  occurred in early morning hours in her residential area and appeared similar or the same as prior 2.

content.detailedDescription: This was my 2nd sighting, which occurred on nov. 28th, at 5:15am, again letting our dogs out for potty run, i looked up in the sky toward the same direction as the 1st sighting. i noticed an object of similar shape as the 1st one and at about the same height, about 1000 feet. i believe this object, like the 1st one, was not moving. again, the sky was clear with lots of stars around it. the lights seemed more brilliant and brighter than during the 1st sighting but the shape seemed to match. it gave me an eerie feeling again. i was afraid to even keep watching it. so, instead of waking my husband up again, i felt like i might be able to get a picture of it with ages old kodak digital camera (kodak easy share c 613 200-af3x). while i was trying to get a sighting in the view panel, i could not belive what i was seeing. i clicked and shot 4 or 5 pictures. the 1st shot that i had taken when i printed out the pictures, came out blank. what i remember of what showed up on the viewer, was a fan-like shape-3 blade shapes, looking like a propeller. however, all the other shapes, once i enlarged the individual shots, left me stunned and bewildered, as well as confused as to what the object really was. i feel that this sighting was something unnatural. i can only speculate that it was a ufo sighting--and hopefully, friendly. now, when i let the dogs out, i don't look up into the sky. this 2nd sighting was about the same time span as the 1st--about 20 minutes. i let the dogs back in and went to bed.
content.summary: Witness observed a staionary glowing object with rotating blue & white lights about 500' up and about 500' away with half-moon shape for about 20 minutes.

content.detailedDescription:
I was sat in my back garden with my daughter and her friend.
i seen the red light in the sky then noticed it changed colour 
i thought it was a chinese lanter
it was a red light which then turned to white then back to red and back to white it moved very fast from side to side forward and back and it would stop and hover for a few mins

i asked my husband to come out and have a look as i had no idea what it was i also went to my next door how came out and see it she to had no ideas what it was 
i was a bit worried as we could not work out what it was 
it just disapeard
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: We seen a red light in the sky the light turned white and kept flashing red and white. it was moving up and down and then moved left slowly and then moved to the right changing it speed as it moved it was unlike  plan or an changing

content.detailedDescription: I was in a car with my parents we were going to stop at burger king i wished apon a star about food and the same star turned over and became a bright red jellyfish like creature i thought it was a star it shined in the same manner as a star and turned over and tentacle like appendages protruded from the bottom i could feel the the energy around me as if i was in psychic contact with the object i looked at my parents and when i looked back it was becoming a star like object and then seemed to disappear
content.summary: Object morphed from star into jellyfish creature with other jellyfish like entities spotted later

content.detailedDescription: We were in the back yard in the swimming pool and i noticed a black football shaped object at the edge of the clouds. i told my son to get my binoculars and after viewing the object with the binoculars i had him get my camera. it would fly left then right, hoover and go in the clouds then come back (which is what made me think it was a drone). after viewing the object in my binoculars i was sure it was not a drone, uav, or a weather balloon. it was very exciting because my whole family got to witness it and look at it. once we looked at the pictures on the computer it really got us to wonder exactly what was this we just viewed. finally it went into the clouds and we did not see it again. i would be very interested in finding out if anyone else saw the same thing we did and what it was. i have showed the pictures to several naval pilots and others who work in aviation here at pax river and they encouraged me to submit these photos. i also work in the aviation industry.
content.summary: Looked like a black egg very small unusual flight pattern

content.detailedDescription: I was outside my house . thougt it was a shoting star but i stop in a could then i back out then back in then move north to anoter cloud.  in 1981 i lived in hudson vally ny i saw ahuge ufo.Now if what i saw is real ? . what about my dreams ? am i being taking every couple of years onboad a ufo ?.
content.summary: It like tube , i was born  1969 this the 2nd time,if they are real are my dreams real

content.detailedDescription:
On the night of august 18th, i was sitting with my mother and sister on my mother's back patio when we saw a formation of 10 or 12 extremely bright lights due east approximately 30° above the horizon.  each light appeared about the size of an aspirin when held at arm's length and the total formation covered a width of about 10 inches at arm's length. the formation seemed to twist on a central axis slightly  then the lights on the outer ends suddenly and quickly  moved towards the center in an arc movement, merging with the next lights in. those lights then moved quickly and merged with the next ones;  this continued sequentially until there was only one bright light in the center which then emitted a cloud of swirling,  sparkling smaller and dimmer lights just as it disappeared.   our sighting lasted for about 8 seconds but the lights were already there when we saw them so they could have been there longer. it seemed to be extremely large, quite high, and fairly distant. all three of us witnessed this.  
these lights were definitely not fireworks; any fireworks close enough to appear that large would have been audible as it was a quiet night and there was no accompanying cloud of smoke. three aircraft were also in the same quadrant of sky moving towards the area where the lights were but they were too high to identify. the aircraft did not appear to be in formation but were moving fast.
my mother called the local sheriff's office to report it. the deputy she spoke to stated that a similar sighting had been reported the previous night.  i also posted to a local facebook group and one other person replied that he had seen it as well. additionally, the cat seemed very disturbed and climbed to a spot she had never climbed to where she sat staring in that direction for nearly an hour. note: i grew up in this area and am accustomed to seeing maneuvers from davis monthan afb being carried out over this valley;  this was most definitely nothing like that.
content.summary: A very wide single chevron made up several bright lights which merged sequentially from the outside in then emitted a burst of smaller swirling lights before disappearing.

content.detailedDescription: Brought my dogs out in early am 6:30am and saw bright object in sse sky, got my celestial binoculars and could not believe what i saw. it was a circular orb with blue green color and what looked lighting bolts pulsating through it. had my wife(a strong ufo unbeliver)look and she was amazed. i observed it for about 40 min. and neighbors were passing by going for am walk. i had them watch it through my binoculars and they could not believe what they were seing. watched until clouds covered it up. commercial jes airliner fly toward near end of the sighting 7am)i am extremely interested in astrophysics and astromony and an avid sky watcher. this was not of this world. i am a pharmacist and a credible witness,as are the other witnesses.Did anyone else see this. thank you, dave menor
content.summary: Saw bright oject in am sky so got binoculars and was shocked to see blue green orb got my wife and neighbors to see all were amazed

content.detailedDescription: I am research scholar at iiser kolkata. i am a climatologist. i was returning back from my lab with a friend of mine. i looked up to see the full moon and this moving star like light caught my attention. i asked my friend to watch it. the object was star like with no distinct shape. it was bright. it moved in straight line and vanished after some distance. as the skies above my institute comes in the regular flight path, i am quite sure it was not a plane. and the speed was too low to be a meteor. it appeared to be obstructed by the clouds so can not be a lantern. and its sudden disappearance makes its more mysterious. i dont think it was a satellite, as it vanished all of a sudden.
content.summary: It was too slow to be a meteor,no blinking lights or tail and too high to be a lantern.

content.detailedDescription: It was june 30, 2016, approx 9:30 pm and i was out walking my dogs on my crescent. it was a clear night and you could see the stars quite nicely. as i was rounding my crescent, traveling south i noticed a white circular object in the east sky at about a 45 degree angle from my vantage point, above the tree line. it seemed maybe ~ 5 miles away from where i was. it was travelling in a straight line from east to west. there was no sound from it, such as an airplane or helicopter etc. what struck me was it's size. i was larger than any star and moved smoothly in a westerly direction. at this point i realized that i was observing something unique and stopped walking to watch carefully. as i observed it, it slowed slightly, than sped up a bit and then changed intensity as it moved across the sky. i watched it travel across the sky for a period of about 60 - 90 seconds from east to west, than it stopped, paused for a second or two and than disappeared completely. i realized at this point that what i saw was not an airplane, planet or a star but a ufo. i went home and told my family who initially thought i was joking around at first but i insisted what i saw was real.
content.summary: Circular white light in sky larger than stars, not an airplane, travelling east to west across sky. followed a straight path. changed speeds, stopped continued, changed intensity and than disappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
On 7 of july (7) of year 1977 at 7 pm (all 7) i was on my balcony on third floor of my building in barcelona (spain). i saw a point of light, like a bulb, over another building at 200 meters in front of mine. the light seems to be so hight for be a bulb on the upper floor of the bulding. then, when i was thinking this fact, the light grow and come in my direction. from my balcony i saw the object growing. when the object was over my building i saw like a sphere with an aileron all around. the sphera was between 80 and 100 meters large. over this aileron i saw windows with an orange light inside. the sound was very grave and continous. then the object passed over my building and i can't see it anymore. i ran to the rooftop when when i arrive the object was dissapeared. i was not affected emotionally. maybe xcitted cause i liked and enjoy this moment. i'm not scarred about ufo's.
17 years later i read in an revue (karma 7) about ufo's an article speaking about an ufo over my city the same day i saw and over some villages they are in same direction my ufo goes. that means i was not the only one who saw this object.
i add a picture. i hope u understand spanish...
content.summary: First a light point over buildings then comes to me and grow. a sphere wirh windows.

content.detailedDescription: I was watching stars and suddenly three stars shape like triangle rotated very slowly to the west and suddenly disappeared. i thought my eye had problem but definitely it wasn't. stars can't move fast like that. and i thought it must be huge ufo since size of three orbs was like stars. i believed ufo but i can't believe it was real and it was happened to me.
content.summary: Triangle shaped like three stars
